tool.name: clin.iobio visualisation

configfiles.configfile: #PROJECT_NAME: Demo project #PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Exome sequencing project for four samples. #BED_URL: https://iobio.s3.amazonaws.com/clin.iobio/20130108.exome.targets.bed #BUILD: GRCh37 ID,SAMPLE_ID,PATERNAL_ID,MATERNAL_ID,SEX,AFFECTED_STATUS,RELATION,VCF_URL,TBI_URL,BAM_URL,BAI_URL 1,NA12878,NA12891,NA12892,1,2,proband,https://s3.amazonaws.com/iobio/samples/vcf/platinum-exome.vcf.gz,,https://s3.amazonaws.com/iobio/samples/bam/NA12878.exome.bam, 1,NA12877,NA12891,NA12892,2,1,sibling,https://s3.amazonaws.com/iobio/samples/vcf/platinum-exome.vcf.gz,,https://s3.amazonaws.com/iobio/samples/bam/NA12877.exome.bam, 1,NA12891,0,0,1,1,father,https://s3.amazonaws.com/iobio/samples/vcf/platinum-exome.vcf.gz,,https://s3.amazonaws.com/iobio/samples/bam/NA12892.exome.bam, 1,NA12892,0,0,2,1,mother,https://s3.amazonaws.com/iobio/samples/vcf/platinum-exome.vcf.gz,,https://s3.amazonaws.com/iobio/samples/bam/NA12891.exome.bam,

tool.help:
Required inputs:
1. BAM file: binary alignment map file
The `iobio project`_ is developed by the `Marth lab`_ at the `University of Utah Center for Genetic Discovery`_.
.. _iobio project: https://iobio.io .. _Marth lab: https://marthlab.org/ .. _University of Utah Center for Genetic Discovery: https://ucgd.genetics.utah.edu/
## /?gene=PDHA1&genes=PDHA1,ARHGAP8,RAI1,PLXNA1,SCN8A,SMARCA2&species=Human&build=GRCh38&affectedSibs=&unaffectedSibs=&rel0=proband&sex0=female&vcf0=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fvcf%2F2021_platinum%2F2021_platinum_exomes_GRCh38.vcf.gz&tbi0=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fvcf%2F2021_platinum%2F2021_platinum_exomes_GRCh38.vcf.gz.tbi&bam0=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fcram%2F2021_platinum%2FGRCh38_exomes%2FNA12878.cram&bai0=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fcram%2F2021_platinum%2FGRCh38_exomes%2FNA12878.cram.crai&sample0=NA12878&affectedStatus0=affected&rel1=mother&sex1=female&vcf1=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fvcf%2F2021_platinum%2F2021_platinum_exomes_GRCh38.vcf.gz&tbi1=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fvcf%2F2021_platinum%2F2021_platinum_exomes_GRCh38.vcf.gz.tbi&bam1=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fcram%2F2021_platinum%2FGRCh38_exomes%2FNA12892.cram&bai1=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fcram%2F2021_platinum%2FGRCh38_exomes%2FNA12892.cram.crai&sample1=NA12892&affectedStatus1=unaffected&rel2=father&sex2=male&vcf2=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fvcf%2F2021_platinum%2F2021_platinum_exomes_GRCh38.vcf.gz&tbi2=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fvcf%2F2021_platinum%2F2021_platinum_exomes_GRCh38.vcf.gz.tbi&bam2=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fcram%2F2021_platinum%2FGRCh38_exomes%2FNA12891.cram&bai2=https%3A%2F%2Fiobio.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fsamples%2Fcram%2F2021_platinum%2FGRCh38_exomes%2FNA12891.cram.crai&sample2=NA12891&affectedStatus2=unaffected
